alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 6:34PM EST until February 20 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Onondaga and Madison counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could approach 1 inch per hour this evening. The heaviest snow amounts, greater than 3 inches, will likely occur in the elevated terrain of southern Onondaga and Madison Counties.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org or by dialing 511 from within the state.
